name: Super Ryu World
overview: This game, made by me, the incredible Aguni_ and dedicated to the supreme leader Kim Jong-Ryukahr is intended to be beginner friendly! and it actually is, that's the best part. If you're new to kaizo and are looking for some friendly kaizo hacks this is exactly what you're looking for. Remember the old super ryu world 1? well, me neither, but now i bring you all this hot new version with hot level design, awesome custom graphics and banging custom music. The game has a total of 14 exits if you include the final castle. Without much else to say, i hope you enjoy it!
